summary: Single-file (one HTML) romantic birthday surprise website from Kishore to Minu (DOB 7 Feb 1979) with a gated reveal, pastel modern design, smooth animations, floating hearts, and interactive surprise content.
architectural_notes: No external libraries/frameworks; use pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript.
Everything must be delivered in a single HTML file.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page birthday surprise experience with an intro gate: initially show a full-screen prompt with a prominent "Birthday Gift" call-to-action; on click, display a secret-name input that unlocks the main birthday content only when the user enters "minu" (case-insensitive).
Implement the main birthday layout as a full-screen, elegant, mobile-responsive page with a romantic pastel gradient background and a centered main card featuring a gentle glowing effect.
Render the main hero content with exact user-facing text: heading "Happy Birthday Minu ❤️" and date text "7th February 1979".

Add a heartfelt love message section written in an emotional, warm, elegant tone from Kishore to Minu that explicitly includes: gratitude, admiration, lifelong love, and appreciation for her kindness and strength; end with the signature formatted as: "With all my love,\nKishore ❤️".

Add a photo area within the unlocked birthday content using a static image asset (placeholder image is acceptable since no real photo was provided) and style it to match the elegant theme (rounded corners, subtle shadow/glow, responsive sizing).
Implement floating heart animations in the background (behind the main card) using frontend-only animation, ensuring performance is acceptable on mobile devices.
Add smooth fade-in animations when the main content loads/unlocks (and optionally stagger sections) to create a modern, elegant reveal.

Add an interactive "Surprise" button that reveals a sweet romantic message from Kishore to Minu when clicked; the reveal should be animated (e.g., fade/expand) and remain visible until dismissed or toggled.
Add additional content sections for "birthday wishes" and "birthday plans / surprises" (in English) consistent with the loving, emotional, elegant tone, without introducing childish styling.

Apply a coherent visual theme across the entire experience (typography, spacing, buttons, inputs) using soft pastel colors, modern layout, and elegant fonts (no externally loaded font files), keeping the experience emotional and special rather than childish.
Ensure the implementation does not add new third-party runtime dependencies beyond the pre-injected template stack and does not rely on external CDNs for scripts/styles.

Add the two user-uploaded images (photo_2026-02-06_14-51-36.jpg and photo_2026-02-06_14-51-40.jpg) to the frontend static assets and reference them from the React app (do not fetch them from the backend).

In the unlocked birthday content (after the user enters the secret name "minu" and clicks Unlock), display the two uploaded images as a dedicated "surprise" photo reveal section, styled consistently with the existing romantic theme (rounded corners, subtle shadow/glow, responsive sizing) and shown with a gentle entrance animation (fade/slide/expand).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a single-file (one HTML) birthday surprise website from Kishore to Minu with loving/elegant tone, soft pastel modern styling, responsive layout, and smooth animations (no external libraries).
Add an intro/landing interaction: show a 'Birthday Gift' prompt/button, then require entering the secret name ('minu') to unlock the main content.
Main hero content: full-screen elegant layout with romantic gradient background, large heading 'Happy Birthday Minu ❤️', and display date '7th February 1979'.
Include a heartfelt love message (gratitude, admiration, lifelong love, appreciation for kindness/strength) and signature 'With all my love, Kishore ❤️'.
Add floating heart background animation plus gentle glow effect around the main card and page-load fade-in animations.
Add a 'Surprise' button that reveals a sweet romantic message when clicked, plus additional birthday wishes/surprise plans content section(s).
Include a photo area/image section as part of the revealed birthday content (using a placeholder if no real photo is provided).
After the secret name ('minu') is entered/unlocks, reveal two surprise pictures (e.g., shown/animated in the unlocked content).
